description.value: Primary Energy: Fire 2 (creating floating lights, minor effect) Supporting Energy: Space 4 (medium range + 1 minute) Range: Medium, 60 ft. Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 6 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Fire Potential + Fire Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Create up to 4 torch-sized lights at medium range that hover and shed dim light in 10ft radius. Can move lights up to 60 feet as [Free] action. Saving Throw: None Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 1 round, 2 = full effect, 3 = 10 minutes, 4 = 1 hour, 5 = 4 hours
